Strings.Text: The door is locked. {pause}{clear}Only authorized personnel can be \naccess the lock. {pause}{clear}It's impossible to unlock.{pause}
This is the river Dylan drifted \ndown. {pause}{clear}The current is too strong to \nswim across.{pause}
Protect the girl from the \ndinosaurs and get across {pause}{clear}the jungle.{pause}
